import re

def count_special_classes(html):
    count = 0
    pattern = ''
    container_match = re.search(pattern, html, re.DOTALL)
    if container_match:
        container_html = container_match.group(0)
        headings = re.findall('<h[1-6][^>]*class="[^"]*special[^"]*"[^>]*>.*?</h[1-6]>', container_html, re.DOTALL)
        count = len(headings)
    return count
